Content_wSideColumn.Name: Testimonials
Content_wSideColumn.Title: OYA Testimonials
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: Testimonials page lets participants tell us about how AFY affected them and how much they loved.

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
• ABSOLUTELY LOVED IT! Best decision I have ever made and the funniest week of my life. Who knew you could be so scared and feel the spirit so strong and get a great workout at the same time?
  • It was spiritual and challenging. Yet it was also tons of fun. You never get bored @ OYA!
  • This camp was awesome. I had the most spiritual experience here and I will never forget it.
  • It was an amazing experience. It is one that I will never, ever forget.
  • I would do it all again in a second.
  • I absolutely loved the time I spent here.
  • The power pole made me test my limits beyond anything I have experienced so far. It helped me realize my potential is limitless
  • OYA ROCKS MY SOCKS!
  • It was breathing! Everything we did had a purpose and challenge.
  • I really enjoyed OYA it was an amazing experience! It helped my testimony grow stronger and I made a ton of new friends.
  • The Giant Swing and the power pole and the jungle jim were wicked sweet!
  • This was one of the BEST weeks I have had this summer!
  • It was amazing, it strengthened me and my testimony and I'm so glad I could be here. I would love to do it again!!
  • Loved it mucho grande! Would love to come back!
  • I would give this 10/10. This was the BEST WEEK EVER!!!
  • This was the most fun, challenging, spiritual thing I have ever been to!
  • I really learned throughout this week to trust myself, trust others and trust in God. It was amazing, something that is going to be with me for the rest of my life.
  • Great activities, great staff, lots and lots and lots of fun!
  • It was the most perfect amount of spirituality with outdoor activities and I enjoyed myself SO MUCH!!!!!!
  • OYA is awesome! I love Badger Creek. The food was great. Staff is always energetic and happy. They kept me laughing all week.
  • The whole thing was greAt with a capital A.
  • Very exciting- never been so scared in my life. I loved it!
  • It was completely amazing! I love how everything was symbolic and had a spiritual meaning. The staff was fantastic! I had an awesome time!
  • This program was very challenging and rewarding. I grew a lot and am going away with great friends and really great memories.
